VisualPlotter¶

class Visualplotterwidget.VisualPlotter(parent=None)¶

Class to choose plotting visually so it is easy. Will also automatically update plots

Methods

add_fitting_widgets()¶

function populates stacked box

avg_data()¶

average data and transform self.x_data and self.y_data this is a really crappy algorithm, but itm ight do the trick

update_plots(df, index)¶

Update the updating plots whose references are stored in self.plots which is a dictionary Clean up the plots which are not there, I think if reference is lost garbage collection should clean them up? (need to check)

updating_plot()¶
validate(el)¶

valid to make sure is a single integer or list comprehension and turn list comprehensions into their equivalent definee here since its an object method in QTGUI
